title: El Pato
subtitle: The Duck
meta_desc: Learn duck vocabulary in Spanish (pato, nada, plumas, lago) with audio pronunciation and word highlighting. Ages 2-5.
keywords: learn Spanish preschool, Spanish animals book, el pato Spanish, bilingual children books
